Class ec.plubar.jStonecastCapabilityGroup 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.plubar.jStonecastCapabilityGroup
public class jStonecastCapabilityGroup
extends Object
implements jCapabilityGroup, Serializable, RtStateUpgradeable
Utility class that wraps an object that implements jCapabilityGroup in such a way that the wrap only exposes the jCapabilityGroup interface

Version:
1.0
Author:
Trevor Morris, Arturo Bejar

capabilityOfType 
 public Object capabilityOfType(String typeName)
Get the capability of the given type, where type is specified by a type name

Parameters:
typeName - Name of a Java interface or class, used in capability lookup.
Returns:
capability of given type, or null if the group doesn't contain a capability of the given type
